name: Which Came First in History? Quiz | World History | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
John Quincy Adams.

	Adams (1825-1829), Jackson (1829-1837), Taylor (1849-1850), Buchanan (1857-1861)

questions.text: Which of these U.S. states was admitted to the union first?
questions.explanation:
Utah.

	Utah (1896), Arizona and New Mexico (1912), Hawaii (1959)

questions.text: Which of these world religions appeared first?
questions.explanation:
Hinduism.

	It's hard to determine exact dates, but it is believed that Hinduism came into existence several hundred (if not thousand) years before the other religions listed here.

questions.text: Which of these 1980s events occurred first?
options: South Korean Airliner Shot Down By Soviets, 269 Killed
questions.explanation:
Falklands War.

	Falklands War (1982), Korean Airliner Shot Down (1983), Bell Systems Broken Up (1984), Challenger Disaster (1986)

questions.text: Which of these famous leaders of history lived first?
options: Qin Shi Huang Di (First Emperor of Unified China)
questions.explanation:
Alexander the Great.

	Some of these dates are approximate....Alexander the Great (356-323 B.C.), Qin Shi Huang Di (259-210 B.C.), Julius Caesar (102-44 B.C.), Charlemagne (742-814 A.D.)

questions.text: Which Greek philosopher was born first?
questions.explanation:
Socrates.

	These birth dates are approximate, as well: Socrates (469 B.C.), Xenophon (430 B.C.), Plato (428 B.C.), Aristotle (384 B.C.)

Elevator.

	Elevator (Elisha Otis, 1852), Telephone (Alexander Graham Bell, 1876), Motorcycle (Gottlieb Daimler, 1885), Safety Razor (King Gillette, 1901)

questions.text: Which country became independent first (keep in mind, this means in its modern form)?
Which World War II or nearby events occurred first?
options: Britain and France Declare War on Germany
questions.explanation:
Japan Invading Manchuria.

	Japan in Manchuria (1931), Hitler Marches into Austria (1938), Germany Invades Poland and France and Britian Declare War on Germany (1939).

questions.text: Which act of exploration occurred first?
options: Coronado Searches for Lost Cities of Gold
Cartier Navigates the St. Lawrence River
questions.explanation:
De Leon Reaches Florida.

	De Leon Reaches Florida (1513), Cortez Conquers Mexico (1519-21), Cartier Navigates the St. Lawrence River (1534), Coronado Searches for Lost Cities of Gold (1540-1542)
